title: Sidewok Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In a castle shaped structure, in cheesy West Colfax style the Sidewok Cafe sits nestled among pawn shops and tattoo parlors. It offers a separate vegetarian menu featuring mock chicken, duck, beef, and shrimp. Favorites such as sesame chicken and Happy Family all come in a faux meat variety created in-house from soy, mushrooms, and other vegetable. Serves vegan mock meats.
